verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] expected to speak at the National Rifle Association 's annual meeting in Dallas on Friday .
President Donald Trump is [V: expected] [ARG1: to speak at the National Rifle Association 's annual meeting in Dallas on Friday] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is expected to [V: speak] [ARGM-LOC: at the National Rifle Association 's annual meeting in Dallas] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] .
